text: The Battle of Fort Cachimán, was a major battle of the Dominican War of Independence and was fought on the 6 December 1844 at the border close to Elías Piña. A force of Dominican troops, a portion of the Army of the South, led by General Antonio Duvergé, defeated an outnumbering force of the Haitian Army led by General Seraphin and captured the Haitian fort. ==References== Fort Cachiman Category:Battles of the Dominican War of Independence Category:December 1844 events
title: Battle of Fort Cachimán
